rules_text:
When Snake Handler enters the battlefield, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Whenever Snake Handler attacks, you may have it make an experience check. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature’s power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
